data.title: 9. The Revolt against the Bourgeois World: Ludwig Feuerbach and Karl Marx
data.meta_description: 9. The Revolt against the Bourgeois World: Ludwig Feuerbach and Karl Marx was published in A Short History of German Philosophy on page 139.
